name: Aercap Holdings N.V.
description: Aercap Holdings N.V. is a leading global aircraft leasing company, specializing in the acquisition, management, and disposition of commercial aircraft. Founded in 1995 and headquartered in Dublin, Ireland, Aercap has established itself as a key player in the aviation finance sector, providing services to airlines, cargo operators, and other aviation-related businesses worldwide. The company manages a diverse fleet of over 1,400 aircraft, making it one of the largest aircraft lessors in the world. Aercap's strategic approach includes a focus on the most fuel-efficient and technologically advanced aircraft, helping clients to reduce operating costs and enhance their environmental performance. In addition to leasing, Aercap offers asset management services, enabling investors to participate in the aviation sector without direct ownership of aircraft. With a strong financial position and a reputation for reliability, Aercap plays a vital role in supporting the growth and operational efficiency of the global airline industry. The company is committed to innovation and sustainability, continuously adapting to market trends and providing tailored solutions to meet the evolving needs of its clients.

seo.meta_title: Aercap Holdings N.V. | Global Aircraft Leasing Leader
seo.meta_description: Explore Aercap Holdings N.V., a leader in aircraft leasing and aviation finance. Learn about Aercap's extensive fleet, services, and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Aercap do?
faq.answer: Aercap specializes in aircraft leasing and asset management services for airlines and aviation-related businesses.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Aercap?
faq.answer: Aengus Kelly is the CEO of Aercap Holdings N.V.

faq.question: Where is Aercap headquartered?
faq.answer: Aercap is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland.

faq.question: What types of aircraft does Aercap lease?
faq.answer: Aercap leases both passenger and cargo aircraft.
